Package com.what2see.service.tour

Class TourService

java.lang.Object
com.what2see.service.tour.TourService
@Service public class TourService extends Object
Service class that handles the business logic for Tour entities.

    Description
    Tour
    create(Tour t)
    Creates a new Tour entity.
    void
    delete(Tour t)
    Deletes the given Tour entity.
    In case this action is requested by client side, it is recommended to first check whether the action is allowed.
    List<Tour>
    findAllByReported(boolean isReported)
    Returns allTour entities that have at least one report or none.
    Tour
    findById(Long tourId)
    Returns a Tour entity with the given id.
    TourActionsResponseDTO
    getAvailableActions(Tour t, Long userId)
    Returns a TourActionsResponseDTO containing the available actions for the given User onto the specified Tour entity
    Its purpose is to provide the client a way to dynamically show or hide UI elements based on actually performable actions.
    It should not replace server side checks.
    List<Tour>
    getCompletedTours(Tourist tt)
    Returns a list of Tour entities that are marked as completed by the given Tourist entity.
    Note that excludes tours that are no longer visible to the tourist because they have been made private by the author and the tourist is not among the shared tourists.
    boolean
    isDeletable(Tour t, Long userId)
    Returns whether the given Tour entity is deletable by the given User.
    A tour is deletable if the requesting user is: a guide and also its author an administrator
    boolean
    isVisible(Tour t, Long userId)
    Returns whether the given Tour entity is visible to the given User.
    A tour is visible if it is: public private but the requesting user is a guide and also its author private but the requesting user a tourist and also among the shared tourists private but the requesting user is an administrator
    void
    markAsCompleted(Tour t, Tourist tt)
    Marks the given Tour entity as completed by the given Tourist entity.
    List<Tour>
    search(User u, TourSearchDTO s)
    Searches for tours according to the specified search criteria (all optional) and based on the requesting User.
    In particular, the user role is used to determine the most appropriate search strategy to be used.
    void
    update(Tour oldTour, Tour newTour)
    Updates an existing Tour entity.
    The tour to be updated must have an id.
    The following fields modifications are ignored and not updated: id author creationDate reviews reports

  • Method Details

    • create

      public Tour create(Tour t) throws org.springframework.dao.DataIntegrityViolationException
      Creates a new Tour entity.
      Parameters:
      t - tour to be created (without id)
      Returns:
      created tour (with id)
      Throws:
      org.springframework.dao.DataIntegrityViolationException - if the tour is not valid (e.g. title already existing, etc.)

    • update

      public void update(Tour oldTour, Tour newTour)
      Updates an existing Tour entity.
      The tour to be updated must have an id.
      The following fields modifications are ignored and not updated:
      • id
      • author
      • creationDate
      • reviews
      • reports
      Parameters:
      oldTour - tour to be updated (from repository, with id)
      newTour - tour to be updated to (from client, without id)

    • search

      public List<Tour> search(User u, TourSearchDTO s) throws NoSuchElementException
      Searches for tours according to the specified search criteria (all optional) and based on the requesting User.
      In particular, the user role is used to determine the most appropriate search strategy to be used.
      Parameters:
      u - requesting user
      s - search criteria
      Returns:
      list of sorted tours matching the search criteria
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if at least one of the search criteria is specified but does not match an existing entity
      See Also:
      • TourSearchStrategy
      • TourSearchDTO

    • findById

      public Tour findById(Long tourId) throws NoSuchElementException
      Returns a Tour entity with the given id.
      Parameters:
      tourId - id of the city
      Returns:
      tour with the given id
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if no tour with the given id exists

    • findAllByReported

      public List<Tour> findAllByReported(boolean isReported)
      Returns allTour entities that have at least one report or none.
      Parameters:
      isReported - whether to search for tours with reports or without
      Returns:
      list of tours that match the given criteria

    • isVisible

      public boolean isVisible(Tour t, Long userId)
      Returns whether the given Tour entity is visible to the given User.
      A tour is visible if it is:
      • public
      • private but the requesting user is a guide and also its author
      • private but the requesting user a tourist and also among the shared tourists
      • private but the requesting user is an administrator
      Parameters:
      t - tour to be checked
      userId - requesting user id
      Returns:
      whether the tour is visible to the user

    • isDeletable

      public boolean isDeletable(Tour t, Long userId)
      Returns whether the given Tour entity is deletable by the given User.
      A tour is deletable if the requesting user is:
      • a guide and also its author
      • an administrator
      Parameters:
      t - tour to be checked
      userId - requesting user id
      Returns:
      whether the tour is deletable by the user

    • delete

      public void delete(Tour t)
      Deletes the given Tour entity.
      In case this action is requested by client side, it is recommended to first check whether the action is allowed.
      Parameters:
      t - tour to be deleted

    • markAsCompleted

      public void markAsCompleted(Tour t, Tourist tt) throws InteractionAlreadyPerformedException
      Marks the given Tour entity as completed by the given Tourist entity.
      Parameters:
      t - tour to be marked as completed
      tt - requesting tourist
      Throws:
      InteractionAlreadyPerformedException - if the tourist has already marked the tour as completed

    • getAvailableActions

      public TourActionsResponseDTO getAvailableActions(Tour t, Long userId)
      Returns a TourActionsResponseDTO containing the available actions for the given User onto the specified Tour entity
      Its purpose is to provide the client a way to dynamically show or hide UI elements based on actually performable actions.
      It should not replace server side checks.
      Parameters:
      t - tour to be checked
      userId - requesting user id
      Returns:
      available actions for the user
      See Also:
      • TourActionsResponseDTO

    • getCompletedTours

      public List<Tour> getCompletedTours(Tourist tt)
      Returns a list of Tour entities that are marked as completed by the given Tourist entity.
      Note that excludes tours that are no longer visible to the tourist because they have been made private by the author and the tourist is not among the shared tourists.
      Parameters:
      tt - tourist to be checked
      Returns:
      list of tours that match the given criteria
